text: Heads up:@CBSNews has learned that Attorney General William Barr is at the Department of Justice right now reviewing special counsel Robert Mueller's report. He may submit a summary of the #MuellerReport to Congress at some point this weekend.
author: SovernNation

text:
Well, that was an, um, eventful afternoon in the anchor chair. :-)
I’d like to thank #RobertMueller personally for delivering his report at the very moment I went on the air. Five hours of insanity. Stay tuned this weekend, in case there’s more. Thanks for listening!
author: SovernNation

text: Because we don't have enough #BreakingNews this Friday afternoon: SF Public Defender Jeff Adachi died from an accidental overdose of cocaine and alcohol. @KCBSRadio and @sfchronicle Insider @philmatier has confirmed the report...stay tuned as we continue to follow the story.
author: SovernNation

text: Very latest on #MuellerReport: there are no sealed indictments, or any more indictments, forthcoming. Nonstop coverage on @KCBSRadio, where we just heard from John Dean, and too many others to count
author: SovernNation

text: I'm anchoring, not reporting, so not much time for tweets. Suffice to say we will have comprehensive coverage of the #MuellerReport all afternoon on @KCBSRadio. AG Barr says he may deliver summary of report to Congress this weekend. Cue leaks in 3, 2, 1...
author: SovernNation

text: Major breaking news: the #MuellerReport is in, delivered to the attorney general. Live, continuous coverage on @KCBSRadio
author: SovernNation

text: .@GavinNewsom actually raised this issue the very day he imposed the #DeathPenalty moratorium. As he told me in our @KCBSRadio interview:"The next phase is, do we prosecute death? Do we continue to move forward as is & spend endless amounts of time & money on those prosecutions?"
author: SovernNation

text: I’m back on the air anchoring again this afternoon—yes, AM drive yesterday, PM drive today!—so please tune in to @KCBSRadio from 2-7p and @pattireising and I will do our best to get you home safe, smarter and better-informed. All the news that fits, we read.
author: SovernNation

text: For those who miss our old @KCBSRadio pal @msug, here’s what he’s up to: doing his unparalleled radio storytelling thang for @wcbs880 in NY. Another great tale, beautifully told as only Mike Sugerman can.
author: SovernNation

text: Imagine the howling on Fox if Obama (or Hillary) cancelled sanctions against North Korea one day after his/her own administration imposed them.
author: SovernNation

text: Hmm, was it near HIGH Street perhaps?
author: SovernNation

text: .@GavinNewsom to sign executive order this morning declaring statewide wildfire emergency to expedite forest management, plus announce $50m preparedness campaign, and modernized procurement process, all at 11a in Middletown. Executive order attached.
author: SovernNation

text: Tomorrow Governor @GavinNewsom heads to Middletown, in Lake County, with emergency officials to announce new wildfire prevention measures
author: SovernNation

text: Thank you! My bad
author: SovernNation

text: Correcting this tweet: I misread the data! @KamalaHarris has a *positive* favorability rate of +2% among New Yorkers, not a -2% one
author: SovernNation

text:
Experts tell @KCBSRadio this executive order on campus free speech is purely symbolic; it has no teeth and probably will have little impact on what universities already do.
(The latest @UCBerkeley incident involved a non-student punching another non-student)
author: SovernNation

text:
New @QuinnipiacPoll finds New York voters overwhelmingly favor Biden for president, detest Trump. CA's @KamalaHarris has a net negative favorability rating of -2% in NY. Details here: https://bit.ly/2UH2O6v 
(Trump was 1st to lose home state but win presidency since Nixon).
author: SovernNation

text: CA ⁦@SenFeinstein⁩ notes how quickly New Zealand & Australia enacted new gun control measures after mass shootings, says US needs to follow their example
author: SovernNation

text: Well yes, there is that.
author: SovernNation

text: At the White House this morning, @realDonaldTrump is expected to sign an executive order requiring colleges to "support free speech" or lose federal funding - and some of @UCBerkeley"s Young College Republicans will be on hand to witness it
author: SovernNation

text: Bay Area clothing giant @LEVIS goes public today, returning to the marketplace with an IPO
author: SovernNation

text: I'm up early this morning, co-anchoring the @KCBSRadio morning news with @QuanKCBSradio. Tune in and join us! Five hours of fun starts in 3 minutes...
author: SovernNation

text: Tune in tomorrow morning when I guest anchor the @KCBSRadio morning news with @QuanKCBSradio! I'll be the one trying to figure out why I am awake at 5 in the morning (without crying children to blame). Listen from 5am-10am for the latest news, traffic, weather, all caffeine-free!
author: SovernNation

text:
I guess @realDonaldTrump can never let bygones be bygones.
De mortuis nil nisi bonum!
Can you imagine any other president speaking this way in public? SMH.
author: SovernNation

text: No one had ever even heard of @DevinCow until the Fresno Congressman sued it yesterday.
author: SovernNation

text: $2 a day to get the paper at home, and they don’t break even.
author: SovernNation

text:
This makes no sense on pretty much every level.
"Greatest electoral victory -- one of them"? No. He won 306-232, the 46th biggest % margin in history (in other words, only 12 other elections were closer). He *lost* the popular vote. And Mueller, like every American, got a vote.
author: SovernNation

text: CA’s ⁦@SenFeinstein⁩ & ⁦@KamalaHarris⁩ join 16 other CA Congressional Democrats to ask Trump admin not to claw back federal funds for high speed rail, saying that would be “unjustified and harmful” and “unprecedented.”
author: SovernNation

text: .@KamalaHarris goes to Hollywood: A-list power players host a presidential campaign fundraiser for her tonight, including @shondarhimes & @jjabrams (it's at his house). $2800 per ticket, $10,000 donation to be a "co-chair."
author: SovernNation

text: UC workers are on strike today, a one-day strike, around the state...and at @UCLA they'll get a boost from @BernieSanders
author: SovernNation

text: Happening right now: Governor @GavinNewsom meets with mayors of CA's biggest cities to discuss new state funding to fight homelessness
author: SovernNation

text: Yay! Wow, that was fast. I can't believe you're finished already.
author: SovernNation

text: Winter is coming! And for you #GameOfThrones junkies out there: I’ll be interviewing military expert @maxbrooksauthor (son of Mel!) about his new book “Winning Westeros” at the @cwclub in SF on April 9
author: SovernNation

text: $1.7B is only the “third biggest fine” against Google in the last 2 years?! That’s no parking ticket.
author: SovernNation

text: Good God.
author: SovernNation

text: I *love* it when people—hotel desk clerks, doctors at medical conferences I attend with my wife—call me “Mr. Newmann” by mistake. Happy to play second fiddle to my BAMF wife! She’s a doc; I’m just an ink-stained wretch who, according to our kids, goes “blah blah blah” for a job.
author: SovernNation

text: This cries out for a hashtag and a public conversation: #TrumpHoneyDoList What odd jobs can the president get done for you this coming weekend? #MakeOurGarageOrganizedAgain
author: SovernNation

text: No surprise here, but SF DA @GeorgeGascon declines to file charges against #LarryBaer in fight with wife caught on video.
author: SovernNation

text: Among @amyklobuchar's policy ideas during SF visit: tax tech data-mining to fund cybersecurity, repeal Citizens United, automatic voter registration at age 18, rejoin international #climate treaty, restore Obama's Clean Power regulations & mileage standards.
author: SovernNation

text: Alameda County Board of Supervisors OKs lease deal to keep #Raiders in #Oakland for 2019, and maybe 2020. One last ratification needed, from City Council, on Thursday, and the deal is done.
author: SovernNation

text: She’s working on that one next!
author: SovernNation

text: The first #2020 pin to add to my collection (which dates to 1896). @amyklobuchar gets the honor (I have some @KamalaHarris pins already but they are knockoffs. This is my first official button of this campaign). The size of this field could strain my storage capacity :-)
author: SovernNation

text: Breaking (ish): @JoeBiden plans to enter the Democratic presidential fray, telling supporters he’s in, reports the @WSJ
author: SovernNation

text: California getting lots of early attention from the Democratic presidential field: @amyklobuchar here today, @SenSanders will be here this weekend (SD, LA & SF), and @PeteButtigieg comes to the @cwclub in SF next Thursday. Many more to come, many times, in the next 12 months
author: SovernNation

text: Guaranteed to be a red hot fashion accessory among Democrats: the red-coated @SpeakerPelosi in shades pin, made by her daughter @sfpelosi, sported by Democratic activist Sue Pfeiffer at the @amyklobuchar event in SF.
author: SovernNation

text: Small crowd of 25 or so at Presidio roundtable on #climatechange to meet Minnesota Senator & presidential candidate  @amyklobuchar, making her first CA campaign appearance. Many of them curious about her, but not committed to her yet
author: SovernNation

text: Big jump for CA’s @KamalaHarris in new @CNN poll. Survey shows Biden leading #2020 Democrats with 28%, then Sanders 20%, Kamala 12%, O’Rourke 11%. That said—it’s March 2019.
author: SovernNation

text:
Oh! I thought it was over already. Oops. My bad.
It's not based on who raises the most money in March, 20 months before the election?
author: SovernNation

text: Yes, I noticed that a couple weeks ago.
author: SovernNation

text:
I was told there would be no math.
(They're not all in the photo, they had a few more).
author: SovernNation

text: This morning
author: SovernNation

text: This was a first: when @VP Pence’s motorcade was rolling along 101 on the Peninsula, not only did CHP close the freeway, tying up rush-hour traffic, but Caltrans turned its cameras away from the highway so traffic reporters & others could not observe or monitor his movements.
author: SovernNation

text: A dozen activists descend on @SpeakerPelosi’s office in SF to demand impeachment of @realDonaldTrump. Part of national day of action by #NeedToImpeach #TimeToImpeach #ByThePeople and others
author: SovernNation

text: The POTUS is “bored”—so he spends his weekend watching cable & tweeting all day? I’ve got a To Do list a mile long, if he’s got so much idle time on his hands. Here’s a deal: I’ll handle nukes & North Korea, he can try to Make Our Garage Organized Again.
author: SovernNation

text: We’re here to solve mysteries! :-)
author: SovernNation

text: .@VP Mike Pence is in Redwood City right now for a “closed press event,” per his office. Rumored to be a private @Oracle meeting. He spent the night in Monterey. Leaves Moffett Field on Air Force Two around 11am, so expect motorcade traffic tieup on 101
author: SovernNation

text: Just as you’re getting over that late winter cold and cough...it’s allergy time.
author: SovernNation

text: "We can't play small ball anymore...it requires an order of magnitude change." Hmm, I have heard @GavinNewsom say that exact thing about any number of subjects. You could play Gavin Mad Libs with that one. Housing. homelessness, schools, jobs, climate change....
author: SovernNation

text: By my count, there are now 16 legitimate (or semi-legit) Democratic candidates running for president. Tomorrow the Bay Area gets its first look at Minnesota Senator @amyklobuchar, who makes her first California visit since declaring.
author: SovernNation

text: New: teachers in the East Bay city of Dublin vote to authorize a strike. 98% voted yes. Negotiations could still avert a walkout
author: SovernNation

text: Yes, this is what it’s come to: the White House Chief Of Staff having to insist the president is not a white supremacist.
author: SovernNation

text: The @warriors announce that @Metallica, playing with the @SFSymphony, will be the grand opening act at their new @ChaseCenter.
author: SovernNation

text: How not to raise your children.
author: SovernNation

text: Yes that’s what I was thinking too. That’s not definitive, from the investigators
author: SovernNation

text: SF Mayor @LondonBreed joins call for “greater accountability” from @MLB as it investigates #LarryBaer incident, considers suspending him for public altercation with his wife
author: SovernNation

text: Wow, so she actually got doored. Terrible. I look forward to the actual final report. So sad. What a way to go. This is interesting wording though, because “into the path” could suggest the front of the truck hit her, which no one said it did. Poor Tess. They should fix that law
author: SovernNation

text: Modern media, maybe. Not “history of American media.” Partisan newspapers, working in concert with specific politicians and parties, were quite common in the 18th, 19th and first half of 20th century.
author: SovernNation

text: This is a very big number. @KamalaHarris, who had an extremely successful campaign launch, raised $1.5m in first 24 hours, by comparison. And that was considered a lot.
author: SovernNation

text: This is wonderful, but also terrifying: I see no snow in this picture. When I was at that very spot 20 years ago, it required hiking across the saddle of a glacier.
author: SovernNation

text: Tomorrow Gov @GavinNewsom goes to @Stanford, where he and @ericgarcetti will talk about economic opportunity and mobility, then Newsom will address AI symposium
author: SovernNation

text: The podcast is up: this weekend’s show on ending executions in California, an interview with Governor @GavinNewsom, and some who are none too happy with him
author: SovernNation

text: Apparently forgetting @KamalaHarris, potentially @RepSwalwell and those whose states border Canada, which includes Klobuchar, Inslee, Gillibrand, Sanders and probably Bullock
author: SovernNation

text: Will Siri and autocorrect *ever* learn that you don’t pluralize something by adding an apostrophe s to it? Cat’s? Dog’s? Seriously? #PerpetuatingBadSpelling
author: SovernNation

text: Here comes Bernie: @BernieSanders will hold his first California campaign rallies of the #2020Election next weekend. Sun 3/24 in Great Meadow at Fort Mason in SF, and 3/22 in San Diego’s Waterfront Park
author: SovernNation

text: Truly, a spectacular @THEREOakland tonight. Standing room only at the @OaklandOctopus for the incredibly funny & captivating @mary_roach, plus Caleb Leisure, Kelsey Lepperd, Kate Brubeck & Jeff Ward. Very special. Thanks to all who turned out! See you at the next one 4/19
author: SovernNation

text: There are interfaith vigils happening all around the Bay today and tomorrow, to express sorrow and solidarity after #ChristchurchMosque attacks. Here are just a few:
author: SovernNation

text: I can’t believe you just happen to be there! Amazing
author: SovernNation

text:
Please allow me a brief moment of celebration: woohoo! i just got into @litcampwriters for 2019! @esalen, here I come. California's most amazing writing conference is back, and I'm so proud & honored to be a part of it.
Okay, now back to our regularly scheduled news programming.
author: SovernNation

text: Not yet no
author: SovernNation

text: That should say 2020-21 season, of course. Apologies.
author: SovernNation

text:
Oops yes of course it is! 2020-21. Slip of the finger sorry!
Well, stadium completion is projected for  July 2020—but NFL needs to know by that April if team will play in Vegas or Oakland. So they may have to commit before knowing if punchlist will be complete
author: SovernNation

text: Some tidbits from #Raiders deal to play in #Oakland for 1-2 more seasons: 50-50 chance Vegas stadium won’t be done in time for 2021 season. Team’s rent here more than doubles for coming season. Coliseum expects new “major” naming rights deal in next month.
author: SovernNation

text: Breaking: #Oakland Coliseum board votes unanimously to approve new lease to let #Raiders play here for 2019-2020 season, and in 20-21 season too if necessary. Lease now goes to Board of Supervisors & City Council for further approval
author: SovernNation

text: Gov @GavinNewsom went on @CBSThisMorning today as part of his national rollout of his #DeathPenalty moratorium (FYI, he went on @KCBSRadio two days ago, and we’ll air that complete interview again Sunday on KCBS In Depth)
author: SovernNation

text: Well this won’t hurt his presidential bid...
author: SovernNation

text: No I never was! I was a roadie hired by bands or promoters, not by lighting or staging or sound company.
author: SovernNation

text:
At #Oakland Coliseum for vote on new #Raiders lease. Board went into closed session as soon as item came up. 
Meanwhile, Justin Timberlake is loading in for a concert here tonight. A fleet of tour buses & trucks
author: SovernNation

text: AUDIO: Musical "Dream" Comes True In #Berkeley, Where Undocumented Students Inspire World Premiere @CalPerformances @UCBerkeley of #Dreamers
author: SovernNation

text: And a Pulitzer Prize-winning one at that.
author: SovernNation

text: A day after applauding @GavinNewsom's CA moratorium on the #DeathPenalty, @KamalaHarris takes it one step further: she's calling for a national one, and says if she is president, there will be no federal executions on her watch.
author: SovernNation

text: Happening right now: #Oakland-bred author @thommyorange accepts his national @bookcritics award for "There There," all about Native Americans in Oakland.  One of the very best books of 2018, and voted best debut book of the year by the NBCC. Stop reading this tweet & read it!
author: SovernNation

text: In @KCBSRadio interview, Governor @GavinNewsom insists he was up front with voters about the #DeathPenalty, and ending executions is about doing the right thing, not politics. No "Machiavellian strategery" here (with apologies to Will Ferrell).
author: SovernNation

text: The #CADrought is officially history. We all know this winter has been historically wet, but it's rained and snowed so much that it's wiped out the rest of the existing drought conditions, statewide, For the first time in 8+ years, we are officially drought-free.
author: SovernNation

text: Senate voted 59-41 to reject the president's #EmergencyDeclaration, which means 12 Republicans crossed the aisle, which is extraordinary, but not enough to override a veto, which Trump says he will issue (his first since taking office).
author: SovernNation

text: Big, big day for parents in #Oakland: OUSD just emailed school admissions letters for the fall! This is when we find out if those photoshopped toddler wrestling shots and that fat bribe to John Sasaki paid off.
author: SovernNation

text: Here goes #Beto, swelling the Democratic presidential field to a baker’s dozen, with more to come. He was a City Councilman, then 6 years in Congress—just like @RepSwalwell, who is likely to jump in soon, too.
author: SovernNation

text: There’s something quite intense, and chilling, about these photos from @CACorrections: dismantling & carting off the lethal injection gurney from San Quentin today, and shutting down the death chamber. Reminds me too vividly of the executions I covered there. #DeathPenalty
author: SovernNation

text: This is why you will not hear what John Burton told us, on @KCBSRadio this afternoon.
author: SovernNation

text: In an interview with @KCBSRadio, Gov @GavinNewsom says he will consider commuting death sentences next (more than a temporary reprieve) and taking further steps to abolish California’s #DeathPenalty. We will air some of our conversation tomorrow morning.
author: SovernNation

text: They didn’t break the embargo. They broke the story. They were not informed of the embargo
author: SovernNation
